name: luckyknight-hhvm
author: Craig Carnell
description:
The HipHop VM (HHVM Virtual Machine) is a Just in time compiler for PHP applications (JIT)

This module is written to either install and configure HHVM in fastcgi and cli mode to run your applications.

You can use a nginx/apache module via fastcgi to run your web based application.

Builds from source or packages for Ubuntu 14.04
summary: Install HipHop VM (HHVM Virtual Machine) - the PHP Just in Time environment/compiler by Facebook
